Symbol.Script_3D:
! 3 Way Valve
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple IF GLOB_CONTEXT = 2 THEN res = 24
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! ---------------------- ! ! --- object rotator --- ! ! ---------------------- !
IF rot_conn THEN dist_x = A/2 dist_z = ConWidth_1/2+actL+boxHeight
CALL "MEP_m_object_rotator" PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn, MEP_Position = MEP_Position, dist_x = dist_x, dist_z = dist_z, Rotation = Rotation, symbRotangle = SYMB_ROTANGLE, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, defaultMatrix = defaultMatrix ENDIF
! --- TRANSFORMATION --- !
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
!!hptsL = pipeR+actL
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, ConWidth_1/2+actL+boxHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, -ConWidth_1/2-ConLength_3, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN ! Wireframe !! LIN_ -A/2,0,0, A/2,0,0 !! LIN_ 0,0,0, 0,0,dTHeight-A/2 !! !! LIN_ 0.4*A,0,-0.8*pipeR, 0.4*A,0,0.8*pipeR !! LIN_ -0.4*A,0,-0.8*pipeR, -0.4*A,0,0.8*pipeR !! LIN_ 0.4*A,0,-0.8*pipeR, -0.4*A,0,0.8*pipeR !! LIN_ -0.4*A,0,-0.8*pipeR, 0.4*A,0,0.8*pipeR !! !! IF ConStatus_3 THEN LIN_ 0,0,0, ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3 !! !! fa = 0 !! IF gs_AddConnections[1][1] < 2 THEN fa = 1 !! IF gs_AddConnections[1][1] = 3 AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][20]-2) < EPS THEN fa = 1 !! IF gs_AddConnections[1][1] = 4 AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][20]-2) < EPS THEN fa = 1 !! !! fb = 0 !! IF gs_AddConnections[2][1] < 2 THEN fb = 1 !! IF gs_AddConnections[2][1] = 3 AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][20]-2) < EPS THEN fb = 1 !! IF gs_AddConnections[2][1] = 4 AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][20]-2) < EPS THEN fb = 1 !! !! IF fa OR fb THEN !! MODEL WIRE !! ROTy -90 !! ADDz A/2 !! IF fa THEN CIRCLE ConConnectorWidth_1/2 !! DEL 1 !! ADDz -A/2 !! CIRCLE ConConnectorWidth_2/2 !! DEL 2 !! MODEL SOLID !! ENDIF ELSE
DIM StraightPosition[][]
StraightPosition[1][1] = -A/2 StraightPosition[1][2] = 0 StraightPosition[1][3] = 0
StraightPosition[2][1] = 1 StraightPosition[2][2] = 0 StraightPosition[2][3] = 0
StraightPosition[3][1] = 0 StraightPosition[3][2] = 1 StraightPosition[3][3] = 0
ROTy 180 CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0.001, 0, 0, 913, ConWidth_3/2, 360, 4013 DEL 1
CALL "MEP_m_Pipe_4" PARAMETERS MEP_Position = StraightPosition, MEP_NumberConnections = 2, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_StraightLength = A, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, pipe_show = 1, gs_PipeMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen
CUTEND
ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, 0, 0, 913, ConWidth_1/2, 360, 4013 DEL 1
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=0, ConShow_1 = 0, ConHotspotShow_1 = 0, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=0, ConShow_2 = 0, ConHotspotShow_2 = 0, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 1
CYLIND ConWidth_1/2+0.25*actL, actR CUTEND
ROTy -90 ADDx ConWidth_1/2 REVOLVE 6,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, 0.25*actL, actR, 2, 0.56*actL, actR/3, 2, 0.56*actL, 0.8*actR, 2, 0.75*actL, 0.8*actR, 2, 0.75*actL, actR/3, 2, actL, actR/3, 2
ADDx actL ROTy 90 PRISM 4, boxHeight, -boxLen/2, -boxWidth/2, -boxLen/2, boxWidth/2, boxLen/2, boxWidth/2, boxLen/2, -boxWidth/2 DEL 4 ENDIF DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! 3 Way Valve
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2], unID: unID=unID+1 !!HOTSPOT2 outCoords[11][1], outCoords[11][2] HOTSPOT2 outCoords[12][1], outCoords[12][2], unID: unID=unID+1
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane
DIM StraightPosition[][]
StraightPosition[1][1] = -A/2 StraightPosition[1][2] = 0 StraightPosition[1][3] = 0
StraightPosition[2][1] = 1 StraightPosition[2][2] = 0 StraightPosition[2][3] = 0
StraightPosition[3][1] = 0 StraightPosition[3][2] = 1 StraightPosition[3][3] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_Pipe_4" PARAMETERS MEP_Position = StraightPosition, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_StraightLength = A, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, pipe_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type = gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen = gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen = gs_back_pen
PUT 0, 0, 901, actR, 360, 4001
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
x = boxLen/2 y = boxWidth/2 PUT -x, y, 1, -x, -y, 1, x, -y, 1, x, y, 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
DEL 2 ELSE HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], hceID_2 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], hceID_3
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ENDIF
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! 3 Way Valve
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
actR = 0.85*(ConWidth_1/2) actL = ZZYZX-ConWidth_1-boxHeight
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
! --- dirAngOnXYPlane of the route --- !
IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN arCosVal = MEP_Position[3][1]/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal)-90 IF SGN(MEP_Position[3][2]) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 180-dirAngOnXYPlane ENDIF
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1-ConLength_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT ConPosX_2+ConLength_2, ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2 PUT gs_Connections[2][4], gs_Connections[2][5], gs_Connections[2][6] PUT gs_Connections[2][7], gs_Connections[2][8], gs_Connections[2][9]
PUT ConPosX_3+gs_Connections[3][4]*ConLength_3, ConPosY_3+gs_Connections[3][5]*ConLength_3, ConPosZ_3+gs_Connections[3][6]*ConLength_3 PUT gs_Connections[3][4], gs_Connections[3][5], gs_Connections[3][6] PUT gs_Connections[3][7], gs_Connections[3][8], gs_Connections[3][9]
PUT 0, 0, 0
PUT 0, 0, ConWidth_1/2+actL+boxHeight PUT 0, 0, -ConWidth_1/2-ConLength_3
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1]+MEP_Position[1][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2]+MEP_Position[1][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3]+MEP_Position[1][3] NEXT cnum
z = 0 FOR i = 0 TO 1 z = z + outCoords[1+3*i][3] NEXT i
z = z/MEP_NumberConnections
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! 3-Way Valves
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[6][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = "(A) "+`Длина` ui_set_str[2][1] = "(B) "+`Длина Соединения` ui_set_str[3][1] = "(C) "+`Высота` ui_set_str[4][1] = "(D) "+`Длина Корпуса` ui_set_str[5][1] = "(E) "+`Ширина Корпуса` ui_set_str[6][1] = "(F) "+`Высота Корпуса`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "A" ui_set_str[2][2] = "ConLength_3" ui_set_str[3][2] = "ZZYZX" ui_set_str[4][2] = "boxLen" ui_set_str[5][2] = "boxWidth" ui_set_str[6][2] = "boxHeight"
DIM ui_set_attr[7][9] FOR i = 2 TO 7 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[3] ui_con_type[1] = 1 ui_con_type[2] = 1 ui_con_type[3] = 0
!!IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN !! ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 !!ELSE !! ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 !!ENDIF !! !!IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN !! ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 !!ELSE !! ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 !!ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT 1, 25, 45, 156, 200, 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! 3 Way Valve
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
!!IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "MainBoxMaterial" !!IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF boxLen < EPS THEN boxLen = EPS PARAMETERS boxLen = boxLen ENDIF VALUES "boxLen" RANGE (0, ]
IF boxWidth < EPS THEN boxWidth = EPS PARAMETERS boxWidth = boxWidth ENDIF VALUES "boxWidth" RANGE (0, ]
IF boxHeight < EPS THEN boxHeight = EPS PARAMETERS boxHeight = boxHeight ENDIF VALUES "boxHeight" RANGE (0, ] ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 3
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Труба Впускного Соединения `
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_1 = ConConnectorWidth2_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_2" THEN IF ConWidth_2 < EPS THEN ConWidth_2 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ELSE IF ConWidth_1 < EPS THEN ConWidth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0,] ENDIF
ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWallThickness_2" THEN IF ConWallThickness_2 < EPS THEN ConWallThickness_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_2 ENDIF ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_2 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_1 ELSE IF ConWallThickness_1 < 0 THEN ConWallThickness_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0,] ENDIF
IF A < ConWidth_1 THEN A = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS A = A ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [ConWidth_1, ]
PARAMETERS B = MAX(ConWidth_1, boxWidth) LOCK "B"
minHeight = ConWidth_1+boxHeight+0.01 IF ZZYZX < minHeight THEN ZZYZX = minHeight PARAMETERS ZZYZX = ZZYZX ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE[minHeight, ]
ConPosX_1 = -A/2+ConLength_1 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1 ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_1 ConPosZ_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 !! ELSE !! IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][10])>0.5 AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][10])<0.5 THEN !! MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] !! MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] !! MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][14] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] !! MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] !! PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] !! IF same_con THEN !! MEP_StrConnectionData[1][1] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][1] !! PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[1][1] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][1] !! MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] !! MEP_NumConnectionData[1][17] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][17] !! PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][17] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][17] !! ENDIF !! ENDIF !! IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][10])>0.5 AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][10])<0.5 THEN !! MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] !! PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] !! ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Труба Выпускного Соединения`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_2 = ConLength_2
IF ABS(ConWidth_2 - ConWidth_1) > EPS THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF
IF ABS(ConDepth_2 - ConDepth_1) > EPS THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ENDIF
!! ConNominalWidth_2 = ConNominalWidth_1 !! PARAMETERS ConNominalWidth_2 = ConNominalWidth_2
IF ABS(ConWallThickness_2 - ConWallThickness_1) > EPS THEN ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_1 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_2 ENDIF
ConPosX_2 = A/2-ConLength_2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 ConPosY_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ConPosZ_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2
!! IF same_con THEN !! ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_1 !! PARAMETERS ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2 !! ConConnectorWidth_2 = ConConnectorWidth_1 !! PARAMETERS ConConnectorWidth_2 = ConConnectorWidth_2 !! ConConnectorWidth2_2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1 !! PARAMETERS ConConnectorWidth2_2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2 !! ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_1 !! PARAMETERS ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2 !! !! LOCK "ConConnectorType_2", "ConConnectorWidth_2", "ConConnectorWidth2_2", "ConSystem_2" !! ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_3 > ConWidth_1 THEN ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1 VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, ConWidth_1] PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConWidth_3 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_3"
VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0, ]
ConPosX_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = ConPosX_3 ConPosY_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ConPosZ_3 = -ConWidth_1/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 PARAMETERS gs_AddConnections[3][2] = (ConWidth_1/2) ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
! ---------------------- ! ! --- object rotator --- ! ! ---------------------- !
connectedA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18] connectedB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18]
rot_conn = 0 IF ABS(connectedA - 1) < EPS OR ABS(connectedB - 1) < EPS THEN rot_conn = 1
PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn
IF rot_conn < EPS THEN LOCK "Rotation"
IF rot_conn THEN CALL "MEP_m_object_rotator" PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn, MEP_Position = MEP_Position, Rotation = Rotation, symbRotangle = SYMB_ROTANGLE, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, defaultMatrix = defaultMatrix ENDIF
